Wedbush's Kerner said the new management structure could prove more nimble than the troika of Eric Schmidt , Larry Page and Sergey Brin , which has been in place for the last decade. What I do think Facebook has shown Google is that they're moving too slow, Kerner said.`` Facebook is moving at the speed of light and Google isn't.`` Having three people running the company, making the decisions, was slowing it down,'' he added.
